award_title: ECLIPSE-PFAS: Sustainable Use of Etch Gases in Semiconductor Manufacturing
subject: Credit for computational contributions
body:
Hi Dr. Chang,

Your work on sustainable etch gas alternatives in semiconductor manufacturing involves complex plasma modeling and experimental validationâ€”work that generates valuable computational outputs.

Citations capture acknowledgment, but not actual influence. Ouro helps turn computational workflows, datasets, and notebooks into reusable building blocks that others in your field can actually plug into their work. It makes your computational contributions both citable and visibly used.

Happy to give you a quick peek if it's useful, though no rush with winter break coming up. Happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
